items.sentence: Tom is tired of being compared to his brother.
Radiation levels are within acceptable limits.
Maybe Tom should\'ve stayed with the children.
I think we should tell Tom to stop doing that.
Tom says that he knows three girls named Mary.
I\'m not very interested in French literature.
Tom works in the tallest building in the city.
Tom was somehow able to swim across the river.
When are you going to consider me your friend?
There\'s a leak in the roof that needs fixing.
Tom\'s pride won\'t let him admit he\'s wrong.
I can\'t figure out how to say this in French.
I thought you said you were scared to do that.
I wouldn\'t forgive Tom even if he apologized.
Do you know what Tom is going to do next year?
Do you know what would happen if you did that?
It\'s been almost a year since I\'ve seen Tom.
It\'s been three months since Tom\'s accident.
Are you sure Tom wasn\'t the one who did that?
Tom doesn\'t want his son to turn out like me.
Tom is almost always in his office on Mondays.
I couldn\'t talk Tom into coming here with us.
I couldn\'t think of anything I wanted to buy.
I didn\'t do any of the things you said I did.
I feel terrible about the way things happened.
Tom wouldn\'t be at the bank this time of day.
Tom told me that he wasn\'t feeling very good.
I wasn\'t able to talk Tom out of going there.
You can wear this watch when you\'re swimming.
Tom didn\'t anticipate that this would happen.
Tom didn\'t finish the job we asked him to do.
I know a lot of people who don\'t like Boston.
I know that we can\'t count on Tom to do that.
Tom has a lump on his head where he bumped it.
Tom doesn\'t go fishing as much as he used to.
Tom doesn\'t know how to play the bass guitar.
I know the photographer who took this picture.
Tom doesn\'t know what Mary is supposed to do.
Tom was more than happy to change the subject.
I\'ll buy paper, and other things that I need.
Tom showed Mary some pictures of his hometown.
I hope Tom likes the present I bought for him.
I hope Tom sings the song I asked him to sing.
I really was hoping Tom would be here tonight.
Tom discovered that his money had been stolen.
Who\'s that guy over there who looks like Tom?
Who\'s the best French speaker in your family?
Who\'s the person Tom went to visit in Boston?

Are you certain it was Tom who told Mary that?
